Package com.google.capillary

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Config
    Static methods to initialize Capillary library.
    EncrypterManager
    Encapsulates the process of encrypting plaintexts into Capillary ciphertexts.
    HybridRsaUtils  
    RsaEcdsaConstants
    Contains the constants and enums used by RSA-ECDSA encryption/decryption.
    RsaEcdsaEncrypterManager
    An implementation of EncrypterManager that supports RSA-ECDSA encryption.
    RsaEcdsaHybridDecrypt
    A HybridDecrypt implementation for an authenticated hybrid encryption scheme, which is called RSA-ECDSA for simplicity, that is based on RSA public-key encryption, AES symmetric key encryption in GCM mode (AES-GCM), and ECDSA signature algorithm.
    RsaEcdsaHybridDecrypt.Builder
    Builder for RsaEcdsaHybridDecrypt.
    RsaEcdsaHybridEncrypt
    A HybridEncrypt implementation for an authenticated hybrid encryption scheme, which is called RSA-ECDSA for simplicity, that is based on RSA public-key encryption, AES symmetric key encryption in GCM mode (AES-GCM), and ECDSA signature algorithm.
    RsaEcdsaHybridEncrypt.Builder
    Builder for RsaEcdsaHybridEncrypt.
    WebPushEncrypterManager
    An implementation of EncrypterManager that supports Web Push encryption.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    RsaEcdsaConstants.Padding
    Encapsulates the ciphertext padding modes supported by RSA-ECDSA encryption/decryption.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    AuthModeUnavailableException
    Indicates that authenticated keys are not supported.
    CapillaryException
    Base checked exception class for Capillary-related errors.
    NoSuchKeyException
    A checked exception to notify that a key is missing.
